item.title: U.S. officials say ‘substantial progress’ made in China trade talks
item.description: The White House said it was announcing a trade deal without providing any details. Representatives from the U.S. and China had been meeting in Switzer...

item.title: Trump administration in talks with Qatar over plane gift
item.description: A deal on a plane that would become Air Force One has not been reached, but ethics experts say accepting it from Qatar would violate the Constitution’...

item.title: Fake pizza orders sent to judges seen as threat to judicial safety
item.description: Amid legal challenges to the Trump administration, judges in at least seven states say they have received anonymous pizza deliveries seen as threats.

item.title: White House fires head of Copyright Office amid Library of Congress shakeup
item.description: The White House terminated U.S. Copyright Office Director Shira Perlmutter two days after firing the Librarian of Congress.

item.title: Why one man hopes tariffs give a boost to his Made in America Store
